nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_28
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: No matter how experienced a speaker you are, and how well you have prepared your speech, you will have difficulty making a speech at such a noisy reception.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_29
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Just as all his sister's friends cared about him, Jimmy cared about them.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_30
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Car manufacturers stamp a vehicle identification number at several places on new cars to help track down stolen vehicles.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_31
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: If you dare tell on me when the teacher gets back I won't say a word to you any more.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_32
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Some elderly people prefer to live on their own while the great majority choose to live with their children.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_33
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Here is something that needs to be reckoned with: How to get the necessary finances to establish the company.
